name: ReversiBot
description:
Be a transforming bot which changes its control along with its form. As the bot transforms, the roles of keyboard and mouse are reversed!

Two forms

  • You can destroy the enemies' red cores with the weapon in cannon mode, which allows you to move using WASD and shoot using the mouse
  • Some enemies have yellow shields around their red cores. You should transform into shotgun mode so you can neutralize the shields by shooting with WASD while avoiding enemies with mouse dash

Four enemy types and boss

  • Four different enemy types each have their unique characteristics and combine to challenge the players
  • The final boss awaits you, demanding mastery of transformation and control
